properties.entry: SELECT C.RNUM , C.EVENT_NO , C.EVENT_TITLE , C.EVENT_START , C.EVENT_END , C.USER_NO FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.EVENT_NO , B.EVENT_TITLE , B.EVENT_START , B.EVENT_END , B.USER_NO FROM( SELECT A.EVENT_NO , A.EVENT_TITLE , A.EVENT_START , A.EVENT_END , A.USER_NO FROM EVENT A )B )C WHERE C.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
